response:
"wir müssen unsere personenbezogenen daten schützen! 🚫💻 die regierung muss strengere datenschutzgesetze erlassen, um das missbrauchen von daten durch konzerne und hacker zu verhindern. 💪🏽👀 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #sicherheit"

translation: "we must protect our personal data! 🚫💻 the government must enact stricter data protection laws to prevent the misuse of data by corporations and hackers. 💪🏽👀 #dataprivacy #privacy #security"

this post emphasizes the importance of protecting personal information and advocates for stricter data protection laws to prevent the misuse of data by corporations and hackers. it also uses hashtags to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
